messages.content: I had a dog named Moti, He was a good dog. He died a few years ago

Ved, I'm so sorry to hear about Moti. Losing a pet is never easy. It sounds like he was a very special dog to you and your family. Your search results suggest that Moti was a loyal companion who filled your life with love and affection. He may be gone, but I'm sure he'll always be remembered in your heart. Would you like to talk about him or is there something else I can help you with?
